means: 养育( nourish的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: If the patient is poorly nourished, the drugs make them feel nauseous.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果患者进食欠佳，药物会让他们感觉作呕。

sentence.Network_en: To make sure the children are well-nourished, vitamin drops are usually recommended.
sentence.Network_cn: 为确保孩子充分摄取营养，通常推荐使用维生素滴剂。

sentence.Network_en: All the children were well nourished and in good physical condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有这些孩子都营养良好，身体健康。

PerfectNetExp.abs: She has nourished the dream of becoming a movie star ., 她曾怀有成为电影明星的梦想.
liver-blood is full and tendons velum is nourished . tendons are strong . nails are hard and shining .肝血充足，筋膜得到营养，筋力强壮，指甲坚韧，光泽红润。
growth will strengthen in the second half of the year , nourished by lower interest rates and the fiscal package .有利率降低和财政方案的营养保障，经济增长下半年会更强劲。
The battle must be nourished and fought out until it is won ., 对于这个战役 , 我们必须给予支持 , 并且要把它坚持下去 , 直到获得胜利为止.

entry.def: -nourished is used with adverbs such as 'well' or 'under' to indicate how much food someone eats or whether it is the right kind of food.

example.ex: To make sure the children are well-nourished, vitamin drops are usually recommended.
example.tran: 为确保孩子充分摄取营养，通常推荐使用维生素滴剂。
营养不良、破衣烂衫的孤儿

means.word_mean: 2. encouraged or promoted in growth or development;

sentences.sentence: "dreams of liberty nourished by the blood of patriots cannot easily be given up"
